text: Mondulkiri is a province in Cambodia. The capital city is Senmonorom. The province was created in 1961 from the eastern part of Krati√© Province. Three rivers cross the province - Srepok, Preaek Chhbaar, and Preaek te Rivers. It has several protected areas. These incldue Keo Seima Wildlife Sanctuary, Phnom Prich Wildlife Sanctuary, and Srepok Wildlife Sanctuary. The province has 4 districts and 1 municipality: *Kaev Seima *Kaoh Nheaek *Ou Reang *Pechr Chenda *Senmonorom Municipality ==References== Category:Provinces of Cambodia Category:Establishments in Cambodia Category:1961 establishments in Asia
title: Mondulkiri province
